rules_text: When Goldengrain Alseid enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic Plains card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
notes:

Gloria Ocete
alt: Gal Or
alt: Julie Dillon (Virgo) — T: Look at the top card of your library. If it’s a Plains card, you may reveal it and put it into your hand. Activate only if CARDNAMEs enchanted or you control an enchantment creature.
